welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huangshan, China! Discover the stunning natural beauty of the Yellow Mountains, experience the rich cultural heritage, and immerse yourself in the charm of this enchanting city. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Huangshan has to offer.

terminals.description: The main terminal of Tunxi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the network name and following the instructions.
